website_summaries.verdict: Includes UV protection in the clear acrylic door to make sure your jerseys are protected.
pros: Extra large size of this frame with interior dimensions of 34 by 27 inches that works especially well for big jerseys, such as you'd find with hockey or football
Easy to hang on the wall with the metal brackets built into the frame
cons: Won't stand up to rough treatment

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, weak latches
customer_reviews.text: Black frame looks great and fits a medium to large NHL jersey perfectly. Latches are pretty weak and cheap, one broke right away but the lock still secures it. Frame is solid and have had many compliments on the two I have. If looking strictly on Amazon despite the cheap latches it's still the best available in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Machio

customer_reviews.title: Its a high quality and classy case!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this XXL case and it fits an XXL Nike Football jersey perfectly. I posted a pic to show how the size compares with an XXL Tebow jersey. I'm impressed by the quality of this case. Its a very smooth finish with a slight sheen that doesn't look cheap at all. Inside is a nice smooth black velour type material. The case was shipped/packed very very well! Acrylic was covered on both sides, secured by dense foam on the corners, in a box, with celophane, bubble wrap, and thick plastic. I would highly recommend this case and would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: wil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hockey Jersey
customer_reviews.text: This display case frame arrived in perfect condition and was packed very well! The hanging dowel rod is perfect to display your sports jersey or any other article of clothing. We displayed a blackhawks jersey and hung it in my husband's office. Frame includes 2 different hardware options for mounting. Overall, great frame for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A. Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice frame that fits big hockey jerseys.
customer_reviews.text: The frame was packed very well. There were still some scratches on the wood which is the only reason I'm not giving this 5 stars. I really like this frame. It displays my hockey jersey nicely. The first jersey I put in was a 60G and it fit perfectly. See picture. This frame is good quality and is much better priced than if you were to go and get it framed somewhere that might damage your jerseys. (I didn't want anyone touching my jerseys and most definitely not sticking pins/glue/staples on it.)
customer_reviews.author: D Harris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It took me years to finally purchase this for a jersey I was gifted. I was so excited to put it up! I put the jersey in and am so disappointed. The bracket that cradles the rod that the jersey hangs on is mounted off center, as well as being unlevel. The jersey obviously hangs off center but by adjusting it slightly that can be compensated for but it very obviously hangs crooked. I'm going to try to put something inside the bracket that will compensate because shipping it back would be a huge hassle. this wasn't inexpensive, disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Jersey Display Case
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would survive UPS and arrive intact, but ordered anyway. Surprise, it arrived in perfect condition! Well made and fits a full sized NFL jersey perfectly. Jersey hangs on a clear rod that hangs on a bracket inside the display case. Nice finish on the case and comes with a key lock. Also has 4 brackets on the back or wall hanging. Claims to have UV protection, but I'm not sure how you verify that. I wouldn't hand it in direct sunlight anyway.
customer_reviews.author: TomTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Cheap closures!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with all aspects of these frames with the exception of the closures. They are cheap and all four ( I purchased two frames) of them broke as soon as I closed them. Thankfully they have a center lock, so it’s not a complete loss!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ponton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence on getting these display frames or others that I saw on Amazon (and other sites), but I gave these a shot and have been very pleased. I started with buying just 1, but after receiving it and now putting it on display, I've purchased 2 more since and couldn't be happier. Great product and delivery experience.
customer_reviews.author: mao6542

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to a football jersey show room.
customer_reviews.text: This case is well made, and beautiful. It hold a special edition jacket, for a young man whom is truly a football fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great frame for a size 46 baseball jersey
customer_reviews.text: This frame is big enough to hang a size 46 professional baseball jersey with an inch or two to spare at the bottom. It is not big enough to hang baseball pants (the legs have to be rolled up quite a bit). The lock is a good quality lock, but the back isn't that strong, so it can be pulled off the wall with some force. Love the frame overall and does exactly what I bought it to do.
customer_reviews.author: cnsf

customer_reviews.title: I Have 3 of These Cases
customer_reviews.text: As I said twice before these are excellent and well made cases.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The latches broke immediately. The door will stay shut without them, thankfully. Easy to hang Jersey. Difficult to keep it wrinkle free
customer_reviews.author: johnny craig

customer_reviews.title: After opening and closing the door a couple of times ...
customer_reviews.text: After opening and closing the door a couple of times both clasps on the latches bent. A couple of days later they completely fell off. Currently the door on the frame is only held closed by the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shadow box
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my recent purchase of this shadow box. It comes with a hanger to hang a jersey and plenty of room to hang it. The only thing I did not like was the mounting brackets to hang the shadow box. There are four picture frame clips mounted at the top of the shadow box. That did not seem very secure to me. It's a good deal just have a plan ready for hanging it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece to hold my husband's favorite hockey jersey
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece to hold my husband's favorite hockey jersey. Easy to hang and so much less expensive than professional framing but with the same result. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great packing as large item arrived un-damaged. Hockey jersey fit perfectly, looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: hawki44

customer_reviews.title: Big, Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Huge and excellent quality. Just wish the hanging devices were bigger. I ended up putting screws through the back for extra support.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherBubsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Never purchased one before but this one was good, there is no way to pin jersey in so you may need to add a backing.
customer_reviews.author: fgonzal

customer_reviews.title: Works well for NFL jersey
customer_reviews.text: Size was right on for an NFL jersey. Lock is silly, but keeps the door closed. Looks good on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, except...
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice...a jersey fits perfectly. However, it is heavy...we had to buy separate hooks at Michael's and super glue them on in order to hang it on the wall...couldn't get it to hang without the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiosM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  I am re-ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought one for a medium/large size hockey jersey and this worked perfectly. Easy to hang with the brackets pre-installed on the back already. I am re-ordering a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Steeler's Display Case Shadow Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas. It is nice and big, well made and locks. He was dancing around the room....he loved it. His precious Jerome Bettis signed jersey was in it and hanging on the wall in his man cave within 30 seconds! Very nice display case. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: ... couple of these in my man cave and I love how my Barry and Calvin jerseys look in them
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these in my man cave and I love how my Barry and Calvin jerseys look in them. Makes my Lions Den stand out. GREAT CASE!!
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best case I’ve ever purchased. Arrived super fast and it was everything I was hoping for and more. Would definitely recommend this company
customer_reviews.author: Huds

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!!!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging survived & the frame was in perfect condition! I like the fact that along with the jersey, we also were able to put our Steelers coins in with it, sitting them on the shelf at the bottom. The whole thing looks wonderful on the wall, and my husband is thrilled! (now I just need to get a Seahawks Jersey signed and put it up across from it!) I see another one of the same cases in my near future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Oakley

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great look and quality. Not sure if the acrylic actually provides UV protection though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey display case
customer_reviews.text: Received the case today, on time. Packaged very well. Case is built well and holds a authentic NFL jersey perfectly. Hardware included to hang on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, they are wonderful for my need. Well built and hang easily. I would recommend these. The plexiglass is easy to work with and works well. Fast delivery too. They look really cool on my sports wall. I recommend anchors to hang them, you don't want them to "let go".
customer_reviews.author: Foxboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for hanging a pro football jersey for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Great packing job
customer_reviews.text: Great packing job, difficult to get it out of all of the wrapping, but it arrived in one piece. Jersey's look great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A

customer_reviews.title: easily fit a Men's Medium size hockey jersey
customer_reviews.text: Very large, easily fit a Men's Medium size hockey jersey! Great surprise for my husband's birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my man who once was a defensive tackle in the NFL. I am so glad I didn't get a standard sized frame because this XXL one holds the jersey perfectly. He loved it so much that he took his jersey immediately out of the other case and put it in this one. It was on the wall within an hour after it was opened. Of course, now I am being taunted about a man cave being started but I'm ok with that. (shhhhh just don't tell him.) :) Thanks so much for making me the best Santa this year.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fair

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: feame worked out fine and had enough room for jersey, 8x10 and movie poster. made nice display
customer_reviews.author: David B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great case and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase. We bought two for the two signed minor league hockey jerseys we bought at a charity auction. The jerseys are a size 56 and they fit nicely in the cases.
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my mother's birthday gift. Very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: hubby loved it he put his sgned shirt in it and hung it up
customer_reviews.author: deborah l thunert

customer_reviews.title: Great display case
customer_reviews.text: Great display case! Looks great, lightweight, easy to hang and fit my goalie jersey. Was worth spending the extra $
customer_reviews.author: Phil M.

customer_reviews.title: Great display case for jerseys
customer_reviews.text: Great display case for jerseys. I had paid over $400 for custom framing of a jersey and they tacked the jersey, which I did not like. I love the fact that this hangs freely and was 1/4 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with reservations.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that needs a better location for the hanging system. Located at the top of this substantial and heavy product are a number of saw-tooth hangers that are difficult to work with without the standard wall hardware showing. Standard screw eyes do not work due to the weight of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: DrEngland

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition, on time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, on time. The frame is an excellent, low cost way to display a signed NFL jersey.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jersey Case
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this jersey case. It is exactly what we wanted and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P. From Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to display a signed New Jersey Devils jersey. Arrived safely in excellent packaging. Took about 5 minutes to hang the jersey and make it look nice. Love the cabinet-style door. I will buy again from this manufacturer. Good quality, price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Jersey frame
customer_reviews.text: Key part doesn't work, and the plexiglass was coming off on some spots but I fixed it with a hot glue gun. Other than that good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We got this and were very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We used an XL Ravens jersey for our wedding guestbook and wanted a shadowbox to display it. We got this and were very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Keep Shopping - Bad
customer_reviews.text: The display case just arrived. The 2 latches on the side broke off as soon as we touched them...yes touched them. Cheap cheap cheap. Unbelievable. This is way to much trouble to send back. Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Cuss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to display my fathers WW II Jacket. The display case is beautiful and top quality. Highly recommended case.
customer_reviews.author: martha ross

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great service.
customer_reviews.text: Product was perfect for an extra large autographed baseball jersey
customer_reviews.author: Alan Dall

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Had a dent in the wood and the plexiglass was warped poor quality
customer_reviews.author: RockyBrutus

customer_reviews.title: The Lucky Duck
customer_reviews.text: I must be the lucky duck, as I ordered 3 of these and all three came in perfect condition. No complaints of any kind and they look killer, super clear and went up without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, heavy duty display case with built in hanger.
customer_reviews.author: ABQreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to display a prized dress shirt. This did the trick nicely. Looks good and seems sturdy. It ships in good packaging too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Display Case
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical when I ordered this case because of the lack of images detailing the item. Once I received this case, I was blown away by the quality of packaging and the item itself. Amazing! Comes with a bar hangar and the inside is lined with felt. The key lock and hinge locks were an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: HOXY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Very durable, very fancy, easy open, and fits our game hockey jersey!
customer_reviews.author: lisamarie1081

customer_reviews.title: Easily repaired. Fast set up and looks perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with front plexiglass pushed in. Easily repaired. Fast set up and looks perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to show off some jerseys. This is better than expected. They look Michael Jordon jersey worthy! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Honest mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great for hockey jerseys!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this jersey frame. I purchased 1 initially then 3 more. The construction is sturdy and everything was assembled practically and ready to go. The only labor intensive part was the removal of the paper coating on the plexi glass.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea In AK

customer_reviews.title: NOVA Mom
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! HUGE! Fix the football shirt perfectly! Packed very well through the mail. Nothing came in broke or scratched. Was very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came nicely packaged but plexi was not secured properly and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packaged but plexi was not secured properly and I had lots of little balls to clean up, I think the plexi cut one of the silicone bags, the balls were everywhere. Fit the shirt nicely and looks great hanging on my son's wall, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: pauline lehuede

customer_reviews.title: NICE STUFF
customer_reviews.text: WE BOUGHT TWO CASES AND ARE VERY PLEASED WITH THEM. THEY ARE BIG ENOUGH TO DISPLAY THE SHIRTS WITHOUT FOLDING THE FRONT OF THEM, THE CASES ARE VERY ATTRACTIVE. THEY WERE READY TO HANG. NO PROBLEMS WHAT SO EVER. WE ARE VERY PEASED WITH THE CASES.
customer_reviews.author: JANCY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and the Aaron Rogers jersey looked great in it.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good looking frame. Came well packed. Jersey fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Display Case
customer_reviews.text: Great looking display case. It came packaged extremely well. Not a single scratch. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: IYAAYAS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better then I thought. I received a lot of compliments. The jersey fits great and I would recommend this case
customer_reviews.author: Tara G.

customer_reviews.title: Yes. My husband was able to put his XXL ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes. My husband was able to put his XXL Tebow jersey in it and he loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product that fits XL jerseys perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, it fit my mens XL Detroit Red Wings hockey jersey perfectly without having to bunch or fold the jersey. For the price this is a great product! I will be buying another soon for my Michigan football jersey!
customer_reviews.author: William Weber

customer_reviews.title: The right case for a professional jersey
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed many of the other cases out there. I would recommend this one for any professional jersey. It was the right size for a Large football jersey. Easy to hang and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the product. I love that it locks. Plastic but does not look like it and really does a nice job displaying the jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great display case.
customer_reviews.text: XL Hockey Jersey fit well inside box and was easy to hang. Looks very nice. Frame quality is good. Arrived quickly and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a got a signed gone jersy this case was awesome Really made the jersey pop I gave it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a got a signed gone jersy this case was awesome Really made the jersey pop I gave it to my 12 year old nephew so the locking feature was a plus
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hartnett

customer_reviews.title: ... paying $400 to get my jerseys framed when this awesome product exists
customer_reviews.text: Why was I paying $400 to get my jerseys framed when this awesome product exists?! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Burkhead

customer_reviews.title: Display Case
customer_reviews.text: I choose this display case to show off my Autographed Sonny Jurgensen Jersey from 1983 when he was inducted into the Hall of Fame. I needed a large, nice looking case that would last a life time. This case was the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: glenn beall

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, packed very well. My Brian Cushing signed XXLarge Texans Jersey fit well. Wood recommend this product for anyone needing to hang a jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Peanut
customer_reviews.text: XX Large Hockey Jersey fits nicely., looks great. I like that the frame is not very heavy. Easy to hang.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for NFL, and saved $400.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to hang. NFL jersey fit perfect. No issues whatsoever. Saved $400 by ordering this.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was just the right size for an XL rugby shirt.

customer_reviews.title: Large signed auto jersey
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and the jersey fit good, looks great hanging on wall, i would buy more if i was to get more jerseys

customer_reviews.title: item good and im overall pleased with the item would recommed it yo.oyhers
customer_reviews.text: How I feel about item. Overall good item. I would recommend this item to other people. I'm vary satisfied ok

customer_reviews.title: Jersey Display Case
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for My son was soo surprised on Christmas Day. The quality is perfect fro the price.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a baseball jersey that fit perfectly into the frame. I was nervous about this purchase but I was blown away. The frame itself looks great and it looks even better with the jersey in it.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Best Jersey Display wall mount!
customer_reviews.text: First off if you are on the fence about this, don't. It is extremely nice and comes packaged well. It looks great on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: brody

product_meta.title: XX Large Football/Hockey Uniform Jersey Display Case Frame, UV Protection Ultra Clear, Locks
product_meta.description: This jersey display case is made from hand selected beechwood. Repeated sanded to achieve smooth and elegant appearance. A great way to showcase an autographed or memorable X Large size football, baseball, basketball,soccer, Hockey jersey or sport shirt. Black matted background with jersey-friendly-material to creates a fancy and elegant contrast. This large frame gives you enough space to store most X large size sport jersey. The display case has a Hinged UV Protection acrylic door cover to protect from dust and damage. Brass hinges, door latches, and wall brackets to hang (Wall mounted). Hanger rod included. Measurements: 35"H X 28"W X 2"D, Inside : 34"H X 27"W X 1.25"D
feature_bullets: Black Finish. Solid wood frame, Hanger included. Jersey NOT Included.
UV protectin ULTRA CLEAR acrylic door with built-in Lock
Felt interior background with acid-free material to protect the jersey
No assembly is required. Comes in one piece
Measurements: 35"H X 28"W X 2"D, Inside : 34"H X 27"W X 1.25"D
